name: Dance of the Penguins
description:
In Dance of the Penguins, penguins make no distinction between good and evil. You have been tasked with collecting candy canes while surviving their shenanigans. See how long you can evade the hordes.

Play with the WASD keys, or the left stick on your controller, and avoid all penguins.

This is our first game, developed from the ground up using C++ and OpenGL without the use of an existing engine. The models and animations were made with Blender.

Elias Kouwenhoven @SNAKFRIEN Programmer

Rey Bejarano @ratatutti Artist

Special thanks to Darren & Lars for QA  testing our game. We will never forgive them for the terrible things they said about it. We look forward to working with them again in the future.
